description: This file implements the NoteService class, an in-memory thread-safe service for managing notes, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes with initial seed data.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: In-memory implementation of INoteService using a thread-safe concurrent dictionary.

methods.name: NoteService
methods.description: Constructor initializing the service with seed data.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Returns all notes ordered by most recent update.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new note, assigning it a unique ID and timestamps.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note by its ID.
